Label: SUMO1-K270-NR5A2-2
Comment: Lysine-270 in the long isoform (isoform 2) corresponds to lysine-224 in the shorter isoform (isoform 1).

Label: 2SUMO1:THRA-2
Comment: PIAS2-2 SUMOylates THRA (alpha-1 isoform, THRA-2 in UniProt) with SUMO1 at lysine-283 and lysine-389. (A lysine residue corresponding to lysine-389 does not exist in the alpha-2 isoform.)

Label: SUMO3-K283,K389-THRA-2
Comment: PIAS2-2 SUMOylates THRA (alpha-1 isoform, THRA-2 in UniProt) with SUMO3 at lysine-283 and lysine-389. (A lysine residue corresponding to lysine-389 does not exist in the alpha-2 isoform.)

Label: SUMO1-K132,K289-NR1H4
Comment: Lysine-289 in NR1H4-1 corresponds to lysine-277 in NR1H4-2.
